game.name: Luxman Moonlit Market
game.shortDescription: A strategic tile-placement roguelike with Balatro-inspired power-up management. Join the flamboyant Uncle Luxman to build the ultimate traveling carnival, master attraction placement, unleash wild charm synergies, and satisfy dynamic crowd demands.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A strategic tile-placement roguelike with Balatro-inspired power-up management. Join the flamboyant Uncle Luxman to build the ultimate traveling carnival, master attraction placement, unleash wild charm synergies, and satisfy dynamic crowd demands.
